name: Free Drum Game with Animal Sounds
name_original: Free Drum Game with Animal Sounds
description:
Does your child like drums and piano games? Do you want to became a big drummer? This Free Baby Drum Studio Kit with Animal Sounds kids game is a very fun special bongo & conga game for free. Your little one will love this mini drum studio.
Furthermore this app provides various zoo sounds, touching, vibration and shaking effect(optional) to entertain and keep your child's interest.
It is a great musical way to keeps your babies amused while explore and learning conga music. With Baby Drum Studio Kit your toddlers can learn bongo drums and animal sounds only by touching the screen.
Features:
- Bright colors to keep your baby amused
- Realistic animal drums (monkey, elephant, frog, horse, dog, snake, lion, pig, cat, owl sounds)
- Cool touch animations and vibration effects
- 8 different music and authentic studio sounds of congas and bongos beats
- Hours of funtime
- Multi-touch piano system
- 720p HD tablet ready

Your children can play with bongo, conga, bass drum and cymbals for free.This drum studio game is a great fun and allow parents and kids to learn music and animal sounds together at an time.
